info.name: 4chan - Darkwood Blue
info.description:
A theme that uses transparencies, a lot of blue and a wood texture for background.

Should look good on most resolutions. 

NOTICE - Both of the screen shots are after the style is applied. The reason for this is that userstyles.org keeps 
giving me Apache errors if I try to upload any other way.

Tested in Chrome and Firefox.

4chan x is supported.
info.additionalInfo:
1.37
- OP bug fixed. (Strange spaces)

1.36
- Minor fixes

1.35
- Removed moots stupid banner on top
- Tiny bug in Chrome fixed.

1.34
- Minor bug fixes

1.33
- Small animation errors fixed.

1.32
- Small bug fix
- Footer removed. (Already have navigation at the top that scrolls with the page)
- Page navigation moved to the side. Will scroll with page for easy access.
- Announcements are hidden by default. Are visible by hovering with mouse over the arrow under the board title. 
- Adds are now blocked.

It should now be easier to navigate.
 
1.31
- Various style updates, looks a little more glassy now
- Postbox been moved to the bottom right corner and will stay there while scrolling. Will slide out on mouse hover. 

1.3
- Support for text boards
- Various bugs fixed

1.2.1
- Added support for frames (Chrome and Firefox)(updated this code 5 times already, hopefully it works perfectly now..)

1.2
- Small bug fixes.
- Small animation on front page.
- Background image is now in sRGB and should render the same in Firefox and Chrome. 
- Images now have rounded corners. 

1.1.1
- Some adjustments to the fonts, should be a little easier to read.

1.1
- Various bug fixes. 

Version 1.0, first release

Tested on Firefox 8, Nightly 10 and Chrome 15.
Works great with 4chan x 2.20.1.
